channel.title: IP Addresses on WTF - the terminal dashboard
channel.description: Recent content in IP Addresses on WTF - the terminal dashboard

item.title: IP-API
item.description: Added in v0.0.7. Displays your current IP address information, from IP-APIcom. Note: IP-API.com has a free-plan rate limit of 120 requests per minute. Configuration ipinfo:colors:name:redvalue:whiteenabled:trueposition:top:1left:2height:1width:1refreshInterval:150 Attributes Name Description Value border Optional Whether or not to draw this widget with a border. Default: true. true, false colors.name Optional The default colour for the row names. Default: red. Any X11 color name or long-form hex value (i.

item.title: IPInfo
item.description: Displays your current IP address information, from ipinfo.io. Note: IPInfo.io has a free-plan rate limit of 1000 requests per day. Configuration ipinfo:colors:name:redvalue:whiteenabled:trueposition:top:1left:2height:1width:1refreshInterval:150 Attributes Name Description Value border Optional Whether or not to draw this widget with a border. Default: true. true, false colors.name Optional The default colour for the row names. Default: red. Any X11 color name or long-form hex value (i.
